Name: amh-muhammedsadiqan-la
Author: Muhammed Sadiq And Muhammed Sani Habib

Translations.Text: bekehadiwochi layi (wedak’i kehonewi) le’irisu melashi yelewimi፡፡
ye(semayati) meselalochi balebeti kehonewi alahi (melashi yelewimi)፡፡
mela’ikituna menifesumi liku amisa shihi ‘ameti behone k’eni wisit’i wede’irisu yarigalu፤ (yiwet’alu)፡፡
semayi inide zeyiti atela bemitihonibeti k’eni፡፡
garawochimi beteleyayu k’elemati inide tenekere sufi (nefasi inidemiyaberewi) bemihonubeti k’eni፡፡
(zemedochachewini) yayuwachewali፡፡ amets’enyawi keziya k’eni sik’ayi (nefisuni) belijochu libezhi yimenyali፡፡
bemidirimi layi balewi hulu (libezhi) keziyami liyadinewi (yimenyali)፡፡
melikamimi negeri (diloti) bagenye gize kelikayi (hono tefet’ere)፡፡
ineziya inerisu besigidetachewi layi zewitariwochi yehonuti፡፡
ineziyami begenizebochachewi layi yetawek’e mebiti yalebachewi yehonuti፡፡
ineziyami inerisu kegetachewi k’it’ati feriwochi yehonuti፡፡
bemisitochachewi weyimi ijochachewi beyazuwachewi (bariyawochi) layi sik’eri፡፡ inerisu (be’inezihi) yemayiwek’esu nachewina፡፡
keziyami wediya yefelege sewi ineziya inesu diniberi alafiwochi nachewi፡፡
ineziyami inerisu aderawochachewinina k’ali kidanachewini t’ebak’iwochi yehonuti፡፡
inezihi (kezihi belayi yetewesuti hulu) begenetochi wisit’i yemikeberu nachewi፡፡
